title: Imran Khan directly involved in May 9 violence incidents: Amir
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 7 (APP):Federal Minister for Kashmir Affairs and Gilgit-Baltistan, Engineer Amir Muqam on Wednesday said that Pakistan Tehreek-e-Insaf (PTI) founder Imran Khan was directly involved in May 9 violence incidents.
In a statement, the minister said that Imran Khan had always promoted the negative and reprehensible politics of chaos and May 9 tragic incident happened on his directions.
He said the PTI founder himself confessed many times that he had asked and incited his workers for protest demonstration and anarchy. “Videos of other PTI leaders are also on record those instigated for violence,” he added.
Amir Muqam said that PTI founder’s own video statement was on record in which he was calling for protest, adding that PTI leaders and workers were involved in arson and attacks on martyrs’ memorials.
He said that PTI workers had always attacked and mocked the national institutions for the personal advantages and motives.
He concluded that another ridiculous statement had come out today from the founder of PTI.
